psychological_characteristics.personality_type: Organized, psychopathic personality with sadistic tendencies

Fantasy content indicated by ritualistic elements (body positioning), bite marks, and consistent victim type
Anger expression style demonstrated by controlled method of killing rather than excessive violence

Trophy taking evident from missing personal items not necessary for practical purposes
